organizations: Bouma For Season Coyotes Lose Bouma For Season USD
title: Coyotes Lose Bouma For Season
text:
Coyotes Lose Bouma For Season USD's Top Rusher Hurts Surgically Repaired Arm Zach Borg , KDLT News Weekend Sports Anchor, z_borg@kdlt.com POSTED: 06:50 PM CDT Oct 19, 2015 Bouma Out For Season VERMILLION, S.D. - 
In picking up one of their biggest wins in program history the South Dakota Coyotes may have suffered one of the biggest losses of the season. More from KDLT USD's Jessen And Biltoft Collect Summit Volleyball Weekly... 
Junior running back Trevor Bouma hurt his surgically repaired right arm on Saturday in USD's 24-21 win at North Dakota State and will miss the remainder of the season. 
Bouma leads the Coyotes with 435 rushing yards and six touchdowns. Bouma broke his arm last season in a loss to Missouri State and missed the season after surgery. 
USD hosts Missouri State Saturday at 2 PM. Copyright Â© 2015, KDLT. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten or redistributed.
